abort.wrong_account: The account credentials do not match the original Bbox router.

error.invalid_base_url: Invalid base URL format. Please enter a valid URL including protocol (http:// or https://).
error.timeout_connect: Connection to the Bbox router timed out. Please check your network connection.

reauth_confirm.description: The authentication for your Bbox router has expired. Please enter your current admin password.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Bbox

data_description.base_url: The base URL of your Bbox router API, including protocol and path (e.g., https://mabbox.bytel.fr/api/v1/)

reconfigure_confirm.description: Update the configuration for your Bbox router. Enter the new base URL and admin password.
reconfigure_confirm.title: Reconfigure Bbox

data_description.base_url: The base URL of your Bbox router API, including protocol and path (e.g., https://mabbox.bytel.fr/api/v1/)
data_description.password: The admin password for your Bbox router

user.description:
Enter the base URL of your Bbox router API and your admin password.

**Example base URL:** https://mabbox.bytel.fr/api/v1/
user.title: Set up Bbox
